data.title: ACC Chief Legal Officer Global Summit
data.text:
The 2024 ACC Chief Legal Officer Global Summit will be hosted in Edinburgh, Scotland on 22-24 May 2024.

Accommodations

Sheraton Grand Hotel & Spa, Edinburgh

1 Festival Square, Edinburgh, Scotland

For your convenience, ACC has secured a room block at the Sheraton Grand Hotel & Spa, Edinburgh, at 310£ single/330£ double (rates include breakfast and taxes). Book your accommodations here.

ACC cannot make, change or cancel hotel reservations. If you need to make any changes to your reservation, please contact the hotel directly.

Airport

Edinburgh Airport is 6.0 miles from the Sheraton Grand Hotel & Spa, Edinburgh.

Ground transportation near hotel

Bus Station: Edinburgh Bus Station

Subway Station: West End - Princes Street

Train Station: Haymarket Railway Station and Edinburgh Waverley Railway Station

More about Edinburgh

Edinburgh is renowned for its heritage, culture, and architecture. From the nooks and crannies of the city’s historic Old Town to the heights of the magnificent Scott Monument atop Calton Hill, walk the cobbled streets of the Royal Mile, browse the shops on George Street, and discover nearby Edinburgh Castle.
